Class Area

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.client.Area
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Area
extends Object
implements Serializable
    An Area is a rectangle. It could be used to address a region at the screen.
